::FireStrike::
FireStrike smiled as he watched the now sparkful Megatron go after 
Unitron. "Yes, I enjoy this." he said quietly to himself.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Megatron looked at Unitron. "You will not harm anymore Decepticons, 
how
> dare you strike him form behind." Megatron furiously said. He slowly
> began to walk forward towards Unitron. "I am power that has existed 
for
> over an eon." he kept walking towards Unitron "My name strikes fear 
into
> any Autobot or Maximal of any era." he kept advancing slowly. "I am 
the
> Slagmaker."
